=== Mailing List ===
Please sign up here! It'll keep email off the main list :)
http://mail.bluefirestorm.net/listinfo/ubu-chess
I promise not to steal your email addresses, or anything like that!

=== Points ===
Winner: +3
Loser: +1
Draw: +1 to both players

=== Rounds ===
Check that you're happy with the rounds. 
Matches may be played wherever and however you prefer, up to you to decide with your counterpart.
